pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 7, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Holocaust Remembrance Day Ceremony, and deliver remarks.

Canadian War Museum
1 Vimy Place

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive through the Main entrance no later than 3:00 p.m.
